meanings.definition: Of or relating to the innermost layer of a blood vessel.
meanings.sent1: The intimal layer of the blood vessel protects the delicate tissues inside.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the intimal structure to understand how blood flows through vessels.
meanings.sent3: The tiny intimal layer threw a party for the other blood vessel components.
meanings.sent4: Her care for others was as deep as the intimal layer of a blood vessel.
meanings.sent5: The intimal layer, like a shield, guards the vessel's interior from harm.

meanings.definition: Situated or occurring within the innermost layer of a blood vessel.
meanings.sent1: The intimal cells play a crucial role in maintaining vessel health.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a new phenomenon within the intimal region of the vessel.
meanings.sent3: The intimal space was so cozy that even the blood cells wanted to stay.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts wandered like a lost traveler within the intimal layer of the vessel.
meanings.sent5: The intimal environment nurtures the growth of new blood vessels.
